title: Typeco
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230121/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230121/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : Typeco**

**Typeco** is the digital type foundry for the designs of [James Grieshaber](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230121/http:/typophile.com/wiki/James%20Grieshaber). Typeco puts a modern spin on familiar concepts to create bold and versatile font families. Relevant type styles with a significant nod to the past.

The Typeco retail library includes: [Reenie Beanie](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230121/http:/www.typeco.com/reenie-beanie.html), [Glyphic Neue](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230121/http:/www.typeco.com/glyphic-neue.html), [Chunkfeeder](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230121/http:/www.typeco.com/chunkfeeder.html), [Trapper](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230121/http:/www.typeco.com/trapper.html), [Super Duty](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230121/http:/www.typeco.com/super-duty.html), [Cypher](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230121/http:/www.typeco.com/cypher.html), [Gothic Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230121/http:/www.typeco.com/gothic-gothic.html), [Cusp](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230121/http:/www.typeco.com/cusp.html), and [Zaftig](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230121/http:/www.typeco.com/zaftig.html).

[Typeco.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230121/http:/www.typeco.com/)  
Typeco at [MyFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230121/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/typeco/)  
Typeco at [YouWorkForThem](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230121/http:/www.youworkforthem.com/designer/65/typeco/)  
Typeco at [Fonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230121/http:/www.fonts.com/font/typeco)  
Typeco at [Veer](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230121/http:/search.veer.com/typeco)
author: James Grieshaber
